headline: 3 Value Stocks in the Doghouse
summary: The low valuation multiples for value stocks provide a margin of safety that growth stocks rarely offer. However, the challenge lies in determining whether these cheap assets are genuinely undervalued or simply on sale due to their potentially deteriorating business models.

raw.headline: 3 Value Stocks in the Doghouse
raw.summary: The low valuation multiples for value stocks provide a margin of safety that growth stocks rarely offer. However, the challenge lies in determining whether these cheap assets are genuinely undervalued or simply on sale due to their potentially deteriorating business models.

headline: How Trump’s Tariffs Will Affect Corporate Earnings
summary: Christine Short, head of research of TMX Group's Wall Street Horizon, joins WSJ’s Take On the Week podcast to share what to look out for this earnings season as tariffs come into play.

raw.headline: How Trump’s Tariffs Will Affect Corporate Earnings

headline: Auto industry: Why it's an 'unfortunate time' for tariffs to hit
summary: Auto stocks, including Ford (F), General Motors (GM), and Stellantis (STLA), are all under pressure as companies feel the weight of Trump's tariffs. Kevin Roberts, CarGurus director of industry insights and analytics, joins Asking for a Trend to discuss tariffs' effects on the auto industry. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend here.

headline: Is the U.S. auto sector ready for a policy-induced storm? Bernstein weighs in
summary: Investing.com -- The U.S. auto sector is heading into a potentially severe disruption, with Bernstein warning that upcoming tariffs could move the industry from “earnings pressure to supply chain fragility.”

headline: Recession Alert: Trade Wars Threaten To Derail The Global Economy

headline: The Peril of Trump’s Tariffs for America’s Auto Titans
summary: The administration’s new levies will be a massive blow to the bottom line of Ford and GM and force job cuts across the industry.
